reference.title: IBM StoredIQ product library
reference.shortdesc: The IBM StoredIQ product library is updated annually. The current documents are relevant to this edition, Version 7.6.0.19 of product number 5724M86, and applies to all subsequent releases and modifications until otherwise indicated in new editions.

section.title: Available IBM StoredIQ documents
section.p: The following documents are available in the IBM® StoredIQ® product library.

li.p: IBM StoredIQ Deployment and Configuration Guide
IBM StoredIQ Data Server Administration Guide
IBM StoredIQ Data Workbench User Guide
IBM StoredIQ Policy Manager User Guide
